entry.title: I was glad you weren't there.
entry.summary:
Author: kseniaallis

Rating: General AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 5,865Chapters: 1/1Kudos: 0

Summary: “I just wish they truly wanted me to be there, you know? Hen is busy with Karen and the kids, Chim is having a hard time with being a captain, Maddie's got you, and Eddie...” he stopped, eyes tracing the filtered light bleeding through the curtains. “Eddie is busy settling into his new role. Everything changed so fast, and somehow I’m the one left dizzy with it. But don’t tell anyone—they’ll just think I’m being dramatic.” Since Bobby’s death, the team's dynamic had shifted. And he should've been used to turning around on the calls and seeing Ravi beside him—handing him tools, helping with the tasks—but it still left him unsettled. Because every time he turned around, he expected to see Eddie. But he was somewhere else, with Hen at his side, sharing inside jokes, moving in a weirdly terrifying sync. It used to be them. -or Buck struggles to adjust to all the changes and finds himself talking to the baby. Somehow, piece by piece, everything falls back into place.

entry.title: As long as you still come home at the end of the day
entry.summary:
Author: Luna_soulempres

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 10,490Chapters: 1/1Kudos: 4

Summary: “Maddie, I’ve– I’ve cheated before okay, and I felt terrible then, but this? It’s different, I’m not cheating- and he’s Eddie, we’re not together and we won’t be because- and I don’t know why I have to keep saying this- he’s straight” Maddie smiles like the cat that got the canary. “So, the only reason you two aren’t together is because Eddie is supposedly straight, huh- interesting, so if he wasn’t–” “Maddie” she grins. “Buck” she replies, then with her tone a little softer she asks. “Are you in love with him, is that why you feel guilty?” he shakes his head. Because no, he can’t that’s- he just can’t be. “He’s straight” he croaks, weakly. “I’m not asking about his sexuality, I’m asking if you’re in love with him, and I want you to answer me honestly, no excuses” … Is he? or. Five times Buck feels like a cheater, cheater pumkin eater. Plus one time he doesn’t.

entry.title: Evergrowing
entry.summary:
Author: starylighting

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 186,689Chapters: 31/?Kudos: 19

Summary: Athena and Bobby are learning that parenting doesn’t end when the kids turn eighteen. With three grown children and two still at home, Bobby and Athena find themselves navigating new challenges at every stage of life. Each child carries their own struggles, some spoken and some hidden, but together the family works through the ups and downs with love, patience, and resilience. At the heart of it all, they’re reminded that family is a bond that grows, shifts, and deepens, no matter how old the kids get.

entry.title: The Price of Power
entry.summary:
Author: starylighting

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 165,619Chapters: 28/?Kudos: 18

Summary: Athena Carter and Bobby Nash couldn’t be more different. She’s the disciplined “good girl” with her future mapped out, while he’s the dangerous bad boy with one foot in college and the other in the streets. When their worlds start to collide, what begins as a bitter rivalry quickly sparks into something deeper neither of them can ignore. But falling for Bobby means stepping into a world Athena never imagined, one ruled by loyalty and violence. That tested everything she thought she knew about herself. As sparks turn to fire, Athena must decide if love is worth the risk of losing everything.

entry.title: hate me, love me, as long as you think about me
entry.summary:
Author: goforeddie

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 1,732Chapters: 1/?Kudos: 15

Summary: “What do you have to say after winning tonight? Are the Kings set to a good start of the season?” one of the journalist, Ethan if Eddie recognized his voice correctly, asked. That fucking 9 million a year contract smile was the first thing Eddie saw. The second was the shine in those baby blues people call his eyes. “Oh, I don’t know…” Evan Buckley said with faux modesty, “I think we’re off to destroy the Stars for the rest of the year, if they play like they did tonight.” A few chuckles, some flash from the camera and then another question, the same that always comes nowadays, “What about Diaz? Do you think he’ll save that team?” Buckley rolled his eyes at the question, then looked directly in the camera and said, “I doubt Diaz could save a sinking ship, even if he was made captain,” and then the TV was turned off. OR : a heated rivalry AU, where the two biggest star of the NHL - who happens to be rivals since their rookie year - eventually get into a sort of... enemies with benefits, then friends, then lovers... or maybe they were always lovers.

entry.title: another fortnight lost in america
entry.summary:
Author: allthestarsofneptune

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 2,595Chapters: 1/6Kudos: 10

Summary: “What am I looking at, Chim?” Buck asked, brows furrowed as he stared uncomprehendingly at the map in front of him. Chim cleared his throat awkwardly. “It’s uh,” he cleared it again. “It’s a trip Bobby planned for the two of you. I found it in his office this morning when I was moving some boxes in. It was in one of the drawers, had a sticky note with your name on it and everything.”Buck’s eyes widened, still processing the information in front of him. Chim leaned over him slightly, slipping a paper out of the opposite pocket. “Looks like he’s been planning it for a while, if the dates on these printouts are anything to go by.”“He… he joked about this back when I was a probie,” Buck whispered softly, only just loud enough for Chim to catch it. “I didn’t think he was serious.”-After Bobby dies, Chim stumbles across the plans for a road trip Bobby once intended to take with Buck. In the midst of dealing with their own grief, Buck and Eddie decide to honor Bobby's memory by going on the road trip- together.
